response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. This exceptional item holds a significant value to me, and I believe it would be a valuable addition to your collection. After careful consideration, I am offering this product to you at a special price of $950,000. This offer reflects my desire to ensure you receive a fair deal while maximizing the value I receive for such a remarkable item. I trust that you will appreciate its worth and find it to be a worthwhile investment. Should you have any questions or wish to proceed, please let me know promptly. I look forward to the possibility of doing business with you.", "product_price": 950000}
